CustomField.formula:
IF( And( NOT(ISBLANK( Text(Identification_Type__c))), NOT(ISBLANK( Identification_Number__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Text(ID_Expiration_Date__c))), NOT(ISBLANK( Text(Identification_Country_of_Issue__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Jamaican_Tax_Registration_Number__pc)) ) , 'Completed',
IF( OR( ISBLANK( Text(Identification_Type__c)), ISBLANK( Identification_Number__c), ISBLANK( Text(ID_Expiration_Date__c)), ISBLANK( Text(Identification_Country_of_Issue__c)), ISBLANK( Jamaican_Tax_Registration_Number__pc) )
, 'Incomplete',
'No' ))
CustomField.label: Are Id Documents Completed?
